    ZPL (Zebra Programming Language) Code

    Sample ZPL codes for Receipt Header and Receipt line

    Go to SupplyChain365 Portal Components Labels and click on New Button Copy the code below and paste it into the field ZPL Code on SupplyChain365 Portal. Click preview. Receipt header ZPL code: Receipt line ZPL code:

    ^XA

    ^RS,,,3,N,,,2

    ^RR3

    ^XZ

    ^XA

    ^SZ2^JMA

    ^MCY^PMN

    ^PW823

    ~JSN

    ^JZY

    ^LH0,0^LRN

    ^XZ

    ~DGR:SSGFX000.GRF,3618,54,:Z64:eJztVU
